channel.title: A Few Requests
channel.description:
I have a few requests for anyone looking to challenge themsevlves by coding any of this stuff if they please. It would make my life as a server owner easier, anyone that will could this you get my thanks:
Barrows Armour defence bonus Weapons actually working, Barrows and Dragon etc
And on the side.
The NPC spawns for Falador, Camelot, Lumbridge and the rest of and around Varrock would be nice.
Thanks
Adam[br][size=1]Posted at: September 05, 2006, 04:08:21 PM[/size][hr]BUMPY :(

item.title: A Few Requests
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

[quote=“mursanari, post:2, topic:13020”]adding in stats only takes 1 minute first of all
goto server files then config then item.cfg the open that up search for the item and there should be bunch of numbers they are the bonuses[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2010, 08:10:43 am[/size][hr]soz fo double post but to autospawn npc’s goto autospawn.cfg copy another line then edit it to where u want the npc to spawn[/quote]

Read full topic
